sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"特性，特点，品质"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: quality, property, feature, characteristic, peculiarity, trait, attribute, character
means: quality ： 最普通用词，既可指有形或无形的特性，又可指个性或共性的特征。
property ： 多指同类事物所共有的特性，一般不用于指人。
feature ： 指事物突出引人注目的特点。多用来说明人的容貌特征或地理特征。
characteristic ： 指某人或某物天生有别于他人或他物的内部特质或外表特征。
peculiarity ： 指人或事物独具的或奇怪的特点，常带感情色彩。
trait ： 多指人的性格、心情的特征，尤指先天秉赋的持久的行为模式或性格特征。
attribute ： 通常指人主观赋予某事物的属性，可指典型事物。
character ： 多指一类人或事物所具有的独特的典型的特征。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"财产，财富"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: wealth, assets, estate, goods, property, resources
means: wealth ： 普通用词，含义广。既可指大笔的钱财或物质财富，也可指抽象的精神财富。
assets ： 法律和商业用词，指包括全部动产和不动产的资产。
estate ： 多指地产或建在地面上的房产。
goods ： 含义较窄，主要指个人动产。
property含义较estate宽，指个人或团体合法拥有的财产，包括动产与不动产，或临时的财产。
resources ： 指在需要时可以动用的财产，包括国家土地、矿藏、水力等自然资源或个人的存款及其他财产。

sentence.Network_en: You have to take capital appreciation of the property into account.
sentence.Network_cn: 你必须将该处房产的资本增值考虑在内。

sentence.Network_en: Any property which does not sell within six weeks is overpriced.
sentence.Network_cn: 任何房产如果6周内还卖不出去就说明定价过高。

sentence.Network_en: He bought an investment property for $100,000 and put down $20,000.
sentence.Network_cn: 他以10万美元买下一处投资性地产，并支付了2万美元的定金。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 属性驱动就是属性(property)作为贯穿MVC流程的信息携带者。简单的说，就是使用Action实例来封装请求参数和处理结果信息。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from an Anglo-Norman French variant of Old French propriete, from Latin proprietas, from proprius 'one's own, particular' (see proper)

encyclopedia.content: 单词释义 property n. 1. 财产；所有物锛埐豢墒級; 地产， 房地产 He has a large property in the county. 他在这个县有一大宗地产。 With the city developing rapidly, property in the center is becoming more expensive. 这个城市发展迅速，市中心的房地产愈来愈贵。 He is studying the medicinal properties of wild plants. 他正在研究野生植物的药物特性。 This small house is my only property. 这所小房子是我的唯

entry.def: Someone's property is all the things that belong to them or something that belongs to them.

example.ex: Richard could easily destroy her personal property to punish her for walking out on him...
example.tran: 理查德能轻易毁掉她的私人财产来惩罚她对他的背叛。

example.ex: Security forces searched thousands of homes, confiscating weapons and stolen property.
example.tran: 安全部队搜查了数千所住宅，没收了武器和赃物。

entry.def: A property is a building and the land belonging to it.

example.ex: Cecil inherited a family property near Stamford...
example.tran: 塞西尔继承了斯坦福德附近的一处家族房产。

example.ex: This vehicle has been parked on private property.
example.tran: 这辆车停在了私人地产上。

entry.def: The properties of a substance or object are the ways in which it behaves in particular conditions.

example.ex: A radio signal has both electrical and magnetic properties.
example.tran: 无线电信号具有电、磁双重属性。

means.word_mean: 1. any area set aside for a particular purpose;

sentences.sentence: "the president was concerned about the property across from the White House"

means.word_mean: 2. something owned; any tangible or intangible possession that is owned by someone;
3. a basic or essential attribute shared by all members of a class;

sentences.sentence: "a study of the physical properties of atomic particles"

means.word_mean: 4. a construct whereby objects or individuals can be distinguished;
5. any movable articles or objects used on the set of a play or movie;

sentences.sentence: "before every scene he ran down his checklist of props"

auth_sentence.content: But the property developer had no qualms about it.
auth_sentence.res_content: But the property developer had no qualms about it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But the property developer had no qualms about it.

auth_sentence.content: We normally obtain consent before recording on private property.
auth_sentence.res_content: We normally obtain consent before recording on private property.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We normally obtain consent before recording on private property.

auth_sentence.content: It's hard to prevent China steal intellectual property.
auth_sentence.res_content: It's hard to prevent China steal intellectual property.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's hard to prevent China steal intellectual property.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =one's/own,表示"拥有"; 2. 引申为恰当的

stems_affixes.word_buile: im不+proper适当的→adj.不适当的;不合理的
proper适当的→adj.适当的, 正确的
proper[adj.适当的, 正确的]+ly表副词→adv.适当地, 完全地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 财产,资产,地产,房地产,所有物;性质,特性
stems_affixes.word_buile: proper拥有+ty表名词→n.财产,资产,地产,房地产,所有物;性质,特性

Sentence.sentence: Large numbers of builders, property firms and retailers have gone bankrupt.
Students have been complaining more and more about stolen property.
And efficiency upgrades (升级) can save more than just the earth; they can help protect property owners from rising power costs.
They suffer great losses in stocks, property and other assets.
They argue that when a company like Monsanto goes to great expense to create a valuable new genetically modified seed, it must be able to protect its property interests
They say that if Monsanto wins, the impact will extend far beyond agriculture―locking up property rights in an array of important areas.

means.word_mean: 财产; 资产; 所有物

sentences.en: That car is my property; you mustn't use it without my permission.
sentences.cn: 这辆车是我的财产, 你必须得到我的允许才能使用。

sentences.en: The jewels were her personal property.
sentences.cn: 这些首饰是她的私人财产。

means.word_mean: 房地产, 不动产; (一处)房地产; 花园住宅；房地产股票

sentences.en: He invested his money in property.
Several properties in this street are for sale.
sentences.cn: 这条街上有几处房地产正在出售。

means.word_mean: 性质, 特性, 性能

sentences.cn: 这些植物具有药物效用。

sentences.en: Oil has the property of floating on water.
